Package gw.api.system.cluster

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BackgroundTaskFailoverPlugin
    Plugin that helps with failover handling of the long running tasks.
    BackgroundTaskLoadBalancingPlugin
    Plugin that helps with dynamic load balancing of the long running tasks.
    ComponentPlannedShutdownStatus
    Planned shutdown status for a component.
    FailoverTaskInfo
    Additional information about a background task we are about to failover.
    LoadBalancingContext
    Load Balancing Context
    LoadBalancingContext.TransferInfo  
    NodeFailureHandler
    Plugin that is called when the nodeFailed method is called on the Maintenance Tools or the failed server is restarting and cleaning its own background tasks left after its previous run.
    NodePlannedShutdownStatus
    Planned shutdown status for a node.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClusterMemberState
    State of a node in the cluster.
    ClusterState
    State of the cluster
    ClusterStateProvider
    Provides access to the cluster state.
    ComponentInfo
    Information about distributed component instance in the cluster.
    FailoverHandlingResult
    Failover handling result.
    LoadBalancingResult
    Dynamic load balancing result.
    UserSessionInfo
    Information about an user session on a server.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ComponentState  
    ComponentType  
    FailoverHandlingResult.Action
